channel.title: Typography on Explore Theme
channel.description: Recent content in Typography on Explore Theme

item.title: Markdown & Typography Guide
item.description: A demonstration of all the basic Markdown elements and typographic styles available in the Explore theme, including headings, lists, blockquotes, and more.

item.title: Customizing Your Theme
item.description: Everything you need to personalize the look and feel of Explore â€” font presets, color palettes, custom primary and accent colors, container width, and a brief tour of the design token system underneath.
